alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 9:20AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Yazoo and Madison Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River near Bovina. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.5 feet, Water begins to cover Warrior`s Trail Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and continue rising to 33.5 feet Monday, February 05. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River Bovina 28.0 26.4 Sat 8 am CST 28.7 29.5 30.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
